summary: The Medicare Patient Access and Practice Stabilization Act of 2025 aims to amend the Social Security Act to provide increased support to physicians and other practitioners as they adapt to changes in Medicare payments. The bill specifically amends Section 1848(t) by updating the relevant years and increasing payment percentages for services furnished on or after June 1, 2025, and before January 1, 2026. The bill also makes a conforming amendment to Section 1848(c)(2)(B)(iv)(V).
